Config:
{
	"phones":2,
	"nodes":2
}

Commands:
call 0000 0001
phone_malfunction 0000
phone_offline 0001

Expected behaviour:
Phone 0001 stops working and the connection between Phone 0000 and Phone 0001 is broken; Phone 0001 stops ringing and Phone 0000 stops dialing.

Real behaviour:
Phone 0001 stops ringing, but Phone 0000 keeps dialing.


Full ouput:
-----=====-----
Node Node_0: available
Node Node_1: available
-----=====-----
Phone 0000: ready
Phone 0001: ready
-----=====-----
Command: 
call 0000 0001
-----=====-----
Node Node_0: available
Node Node_1: available
-----=====-----
Phone 0000: dialing 0001 through Node_1
Phone 0001: ringing from 0000 through Node_1
-----=====-----
Command: 
phone_malfunction 0000
-----=====-----
Node Node_0: available
Node Node_1: available
-----=====-----
Phone 0000: dialing 0001 through Node_1
Phone 0001: ready
-----=====-----
Command: 
phone_offline 0001
-----=====-----
Node Node_0: available
Node Node_1: available
-----=====-----
Phone 0000: dialing 0001 through Node_1
Phone 0001: offline
-----=====-----
Command:
